column4: I need help, have the case installed ubuntu on an independent disc of windows it(he,she) is that it(he,she) erases(smears) the session KDE and it(he,she) was as primary, gnome at the time me does not work the terminal.
? Now is my question like to reinstall ubuntu without losing my documents?
make separate partitions next time you install. Separate partition for /, and /home.
otherwise, search for backup and recovery Ubuntu on a search engine if noone has a better idea.
